about_the_game:
Claire and her team are in trouble again. Their airplane flew into a terrible storm and crashed on an uninhabited island in the middle of the ocean. When they woke up, our heroes went out in search of help. After wandering a while, Claire found a village of atlanteans and offered to help them get their homeland back, and to teach the wicked ruler of the underwater world a lesson.

Dare to travel an unknown country full of secrets and mysticism in this exciting casual strategy game, Lost Artifacts Golden Island!
A multitude of varied quests, over 40 levels, a happy plot, simple and entertaining gameplay and a mysterious world – all this awaits you right now! Restore the warrior statues, overcome challenges, manage resources and construct buildings. Simple controls and a clear tutorial will help you easily get to grips with the basics of the game.
Lost Artifacts Golden Island – restore Atlantis and defeat the villain!

-The unusual world of Atlantis, with ancient warrior statues and fountains of life to give you strength on your adventure.
-A happy plot, colorful comics and vibrant characters!
-A multitude of varied buildings that you've never seen before.
-Over 40 unique levels.
-Dangerous enemies: Stone warriors, octopi and wild boars.
-4 inimitable locations: a sunny beach, a dark ravine, a dense jungle and beautiful Atlantis.
-Useful bonuses: speed up work, stop time, run fast.
-Simple controls and an easy to understand tutorial.
-Over 20 hours of exciting gameplay for any age.
-Pleasant themed music.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM

name: Lost Artifacts: Golden Island

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: Lost Artifacts Golden Island is an exciting strategy game about the world of Atlantis. Restore Atlantis and defeat the villain!
